mapper.insert: insert into driver(name, sex, birth, phone, id_card, fk_team_id, state, remark, check_in_time, is_delete, alter_time) values(#{name}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{fkTeamID}, #{state}, #{remark}, #{checkInTime}, #{isDelete}, #{alterTime})
mapper.update: update driver set name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, birth=#{birth}, phone=#{phone}, id_card=#{idCard}, fk_team_id=#{fkTeamID}, state=#{state}, remark=#{remark}, check_in_time=#{checkInTime}, is_delete=#{isDelete}, alter_time=#{alterTime} where driver_id=#{driverID}
